```{r setup}
library(landsepi)
# set initialisation directory
simul_params <- createSimulParams(outputDir = "../sims/")
```

```{r set_params}
# set times
simul_params <- setTime(params = simul_params, 
                        Nyears = 10, 
                        nTSpY = 180)

# set pathogen
basic_patho_param <- loadPathogen(disease = "rust")
```
